14/*! \file dns/portlist.h */
15
16#include <stdbool.h>
17
18#include <isc/lang.h>
19#include <isc/net.h>
20#include <isc/types.h>
21
22#include <dns/types.h>
23
24#ifndef DNS_PORTLIST_H
25#define DNS_PORTLIST_H 1
26
27ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
28
29isc_result_t
30dns_portlist_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_portlist_t **portlistp);
31/*%<
32 * Create a port list.
33 *
34 * Requires:
35 *\li 'mctx' to be valid.
36 *\li 'portlistp' to be non NULL and '*portlistp' to be NULL;
37 *
38 * Returns:
39 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS
40 *\li #ISC_R_NOMEMORY
41 *\li #ISC_R_UNEXPECTED
42 */
43
44isc_result_t
45dns_portlist_add(dns_portlist_t *portlist, int af, in_port_t port);
46/*%<
47 * Add the given <port,af> tuple to the portlist.
48 *
49 * Requires:
50 *\li 'portlist' to be valid.
51 *\li 'af' to be AF_INET or AF_INET6
52 *
53 * Returns:
54 *\li #ISC_R_SUCCESS
55 *\li #ISC_R_NOMEMORY
56 */
57
58void
59dns_portlist_remove(dns_portlist_t *portlist, int af, in_port_t port);
60/*%<
61 * Remove the given <port,af> tuple to the portlist.
62 *
63 * Requires:
64 *\li 'portlist' to be valid.
65 *\li 'af' to be AF_INET or AF_INET6
66 */
67
68bool
69dns_portlist_match(dns_portlist_t *portlist, int af, in_port_t port);
70/*%<
71 * Find the given <port,af> tuple to the portlist.
72 *
73 * Requires:
74 *\li 'portlist' to be valid.
75 *\li 'af' to be AF_INET or AF_INET6
76 *
77 * Returns
78 * \li #true if the tuple is found, false otherwise.
79 */
80
81void
82dns_portlist_attach(dns_portlist_t *portlist, dns_portlist_t **portlistp);
83/*%<
84 * Attach to a port list.
85 *
86 * Requires:
87 *\li 'portlist' to be valid.
88 *\li 'portlistp' to be non NULL and '*portlistp' to be NULL;
89 */
90
91void
92dns_portlist_detach(dns_portlist_t **portlistp);
93/*%<
94 * Detach from a port list.
95 *
96 * Requires:
97 *\li '*portlistp' to be valid.
98 */
99
100ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
101
102#endif /* DNS_PORTLIST_H */
103
